DOC.brief_summary: Phase IV Design : Prospective , open-label , randomize three-arms study Main Inclusion criterion Luminal Crohn 's disease patient steroid free remission least 6 month combination therapy infliximab anti-metabolites least 1 year Primary objective To demonstrate Infliximab scheduled maintenance without antimetabolite superior antimetabolite alone maintain sustained steroid-free remission 2 year , latter non inferior regard mean time spend remission duration Main co-primary end point Clinical relapse rate 2 year Mean remission duration within 2 year Study treatment Infliximab , Mercaptopurine , azathioprine , methotrexate . Number subject 300 randomized patient ( 100 per arm ) Study duration : 2 + 2 year Enrollment : 2 year Follow-up : 2 year
